original_title: Tuition classes for 2023 A/L exam banned from midnight yesterday
original_body_lines: Conducting all tuition classes in preparation for the 2023 G.C.E. Advanced Level Examination have been prohibited from midnight yesterday (Dec.29), as per an earlier announcement made by the Department of Examinations.
Accordingly, conducting tuition classes, seminars, workshops, and other related activities targeting the examination are banned until the end of the exam.
The 2023 G.C.E. A/L exam will commence on January 04 and will be held until January 31.
Meanwhile, the second phase of the third term for the academic year 2023 of all government and government-approved private schools is planned to be started on February 02.
The first phase of the third school term, which began on November 01, came to an end on Dec.22.
